itunes:title: Episode 621 - Special Guest Erin Scanlon
title: Episode 621 - Special Guest Erin Scanlon
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Erin Scanlon, a former 82nd Airborne captain who fell victim to sexual assault during her service at Fort Bragg. They discuss how she is trying to get a military sexual assault bill passed, and why sh...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Erin Scanlon, a former 82nd Airborne captain who fell victim to sexual assault during her service at Fort Bragg. They discuss how she is trying to get a military sexual assault bill passed, and why she has yet to get justice in the court of law. Tune in for an informative and enlightening show.
